pr_title: Support "true" and "false" String to boolean conversion in DefaultObjectMapper.getOrDefault()

timeline.message: Support "true" and "false" String to boolean conversion in DefaultObjectMapper.getOrDefault()

timeline.author: debjanibnrj

replies.bodyText: The only lower case "true" and capitalized "True" are supported ("TRUE" and "tRue" are not valid) the same way how Jackson default deserializer works.
replies.author: vrozov
